hook.text: A neutron star is so dense that a sugar-cube-sized piece weighs a billion tons.

buildup.text: When a massive star's core collapses, protons and electrons merge into neutrons.

punchline.text: A city-sized neutron ball spinning 700 times per second. Nature is weird.
